title: Has anyone tried food grade hydrogen peroxide against corona? - Quora

response.answer_text: How would you use that? What strength are you talking about. Where do you think you are going to kill the virus? In your throat? Nose? Gut? It is utter rubbish. Peroxide is a dangerous poison. It was even considered as an oxidizer for rocket engines. Extremely unstable, corrosive, poisonous, releases gas in the stomach which can cause injury etc. It is an even crazier suggestion than the bleach idea that Trump recommended, if not the same idea. Perfectly safe to use 3% as a topical anaesthetic. End of story.
